name: Voi Technology
goal: Founded in Summer 2018, VOI is a Scandinavian micro mobility company offering electric vehicle sharing in partnership with cities and local communities. We believe e- vehicles like e-scooters can play a central role in changing how people move in our cities in the future. And we want to make sure that the transformation happens the right way - through real innovative technology, open and transparent dialogue with cities and Governments and by adapting our product to local needs. Jump on a scooter anytime and ride wherever in the city - completely emission free.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Transport
euInitiatives:
Urban mobility
Smart mobility
SUMP
Machinery Directive
Motor Insurance Directive
